DataElement.preferredName: Assessment of Survivor Concerns Worry About Childrens Health Score Likert Scale Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how much they worry about the health of their children, using a Likert scale value captured as a non-enumerated text field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Assessment of Survivor Concerns Worry About Childrens Health Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A brief questionnaire designed to measure fears about recurrence and health in cancer survivors._A survey question about how much a person worries about the health of their children._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
